description.@en: I leave thee in anguish, stricken insensible.

effect.@en: After successfully casting (and one foe cannot or fails to Resist using Awareness), they are unable to see for 6+[WB] days. Once the duration is up, they are unable to hear for 3+[WB] days. You begin to Bleed, no matter whether you succeeded or failed at using this Spell.

criticalFailure.@en: You are awestruck by a presence other than your own, as you are unable to see for 18+[WB] days and unable to hear for 9+[WB] days after that.

reagents.@en: Your own blood, squeezed into your palm

system.distance: Any one person you can clearly see
